terms.Title: Toydacity Terms of Service
terms.Welcome: Welcome to Toydacity! These Terms of Service (Terms) govern your access to and use of the Toydacity website, mobile applications, and related online services (collectively, the Services). Toydacity Inc. (Toydacity, we, us, or our) is a Florida-based platform created to support the buying, selling, trading, and gifting of secondhand toys. By using our Services, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree, you must not use the Services.
terms.Subtitle: We may revise these Terms at any time. Updated Terms will be posted with a new effective date. Your continued use of the Services constitutes your acceptance of any updates.
terms.IntroductionWelcome: Welcome to Toydacity! These Terms of Service (Terms) govern your access to and use of the Toydacity website, mobile applications, and related online services (collectively, the Services). Toydacity Inc. (Toydacity, we, us, or our) is a Florida-based platform created to support the buying, selling, trading, and gifting of secondhand toys. By using our Services, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree, you must not use the Services.
terms.IntroductionRevision: We may revise these Terms at any time. Updated Terms will be posted with a new effective date. Your continued use of the Services constitutes your acceptance of any updates.
terms.Section1Content: Toydacity connects individuals, families, and collectors through a trusted marketplace for secondhand toys. Our Services include listing tools, chat functionality, optional payment processing, shipping integration, safety verification features, and community guidelines. We are not a party to user-to-user transactions and do not hold inventory.
terms.Section2List1: Be at least 13 years old (users under 18 require a guardian's supervision)
terms.Section2List2: Reside in the United States or its territories
terms.Section2List3: Not have been previously banned or suspended from the platform
terms.Section2Business: Businesses or organizations must be properly authorized to act on behalf of their legal entity.
terms.Section3Content: You must register an account to access most features. By creating an account, you agree to:
terms.Section3List2: Maintain confidentiality of your login credentials
terms.Section3List3: Be responsible for activity on your account
terms.Section3Note: We reserve the right to reclaim usernames and disable accounts that violate our Terms or policies.
terms.Section4List1: Standard Listings: Post secondhand toys for sale, trade, or giveaway.
terms.Section4List2: Wanted Posts: Request specific toys from the community.
terms.Section4List3: Job Postings: For businesses seeking toy-related staff (e.g., restoration, sales, logistics).
terms.Section4List4: Service Listings: Toy repair, cleaning, or upcycling services.
terms.Section4Note: All listings must be truthful and comply with applicable laws. Toydacity reserves the right to modify, flag, or remove listings at our discretion.
terms.Section5List1: Post offensive, misleading, or illegal content
terms.Section5List2: Harass, stalk, or harm other users
terms.Section5List3: Circumvent posting limits or paid feature restrictions
terms.Section5List5: Use Toydacity for fraudulent or commercial resale purposes without authorization
terms.Section6Content: While basic listings are free, Toydacity may charge for premium features such as:
terms.Section6List4: Subscription packages with monthly or annual benefits
terms.Section6Note: Subscriptions are billed through your mobile platform and auto-renew unless canceled 24 hours before the next billing cycle. Paid services are non-refundable unless required by law.
terms.Section7Content: Toydacity Payment Solution: For in-app payments and optional shipping within the contiguous U.S.
terms.Section7Seller: Sellers: Must register with Stripe and comply with our Packaging Guidelines.
terms.Section7Buyer: Buyers: Payments are held until delivery is confirmed or the protection period expires.
terms.Section7Note: Toydacity is not responsible for in-person payments or transactions made outside the platform.
terms.Section8Content: The following may not be listed or shipped via Toydacity:
terms.Section8List6: Adult content or material unsuitable for children
terms.Section8Note: Violations may result in account suspension, removal of content, and notification to legal authorities.
terms.Section9Content: We encourage safe interactions and offer features like:
terms.Section9List1: TruYou Badge: Voluntary identity verification using government-issued ID
terms.Section9List2: Community Meetup Spots: Locations recommended for local exchange (e.g., police departments, well-lit public areas)
terms.Section9Note: However, Toydacity does not independently verify the safety of users or meetup locations. Exercise caution.
terms.Section10Content: By posting content, you grant Toydacity a worldwide, royalty-free license to use, display, reproduce, and distribute your content in connection with the Services. This includes listings, reviews, messages, photos, videos, and any information submitted voluntarily.
terms.Section10Warning: You may not post content that is:
terms.Section10List3: A violation of another's rights or privacy
terms.Section10Note: We reserve the right to remove or restrict access to content that violates these Terms.
terms.Section11Content: All software, branding, layout, graphics, and platform code are the intellectual property of Toydacity or its licensors. Unauthorized reproduction or distribution is strictly prohibited.
terms.Section11UserContent: You retain ownership of your User Content but grant us license rights to display it within the platform and for promotional use.
terms.Section12Content: Sellers are responsible for complying with local, state, and federal tax obligations. Toydacity may collect and remit sales tax where required. Users who exceed IRS reporting thresholds will be asked to provide taxpayer information to Stripe.
terms.Section13Content: Our platform may integrate with services such as Stripe (payment processing) or Onfido (identity verification). Use of these services is subject to their own terms and privacy policies. Toydacity is not responsible for actions taken by third parties.
terms.Section14Content: We are not responsible for disputes between users. However, we offer:
terms.Section14List1: A reporting mechanism for misconduct or fraud
terms.Section14List2: Mediation for transactions completed through Toydacity's Payment Solution
terms.Section14Note: Unresolved disputes may be escalated through binding arbitration as described below.
terms.Section15Content: All disputes arising from or relating to these Terms or the use of the Services shall be resolved through final, binding arbitration administered by JAMS under its Streamlined Rules. You waive your right to bring claims in court or as part of a class action.
terms.Section15OptOut: Opt-out instructions: You may opt out of arbitration within 30 days of first agreeing to these Terms by emailing support@toydacity.com with your name and account email.
terms.Section16Content: We may suspend or terminate your access to the Services for any reason, including violation of these Terms. Termination may include deletion of listings and account data.
terms.Section16AccountClosure: You may close your account at any time by contacting us. Sections relating to payments, content licensing, indemnification, and arbitration will survive termination.
terms.Section17Content: We do not guarantee uninterrupted access, data accuracy, or the success of transactions. Services are provided as is without warranties of any kind, express or implied. Your use of the Services is at your own risk.
terms.Section18Content: To the extent permitted by law, Toydacity shall not be liable for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages. Our total liability to you for any claim is limited to $100 or the amount you paid to Toydacity in the past 12 months.
terms.Section19Content: You agree to indemnify, defend, and hold harmless Toydacity from any claims, liabilities, damages, losses, or expenses arising from your use of the Services, your content, or your breach of these Terms.
terms.Section20Content: These Terms are governed by the laws of the State of Florida, without regard to its conflict of law principles. Any claims not subject to arbitration must be resolved in the state or federal courts of Florida.
terms.Section21Contact: If you have questions, feedback, or need assistance, please contact us at:
terms.Section21Address: Address: Toydacity Inc., 2617 NW 55TH ST, FORT LAUDERDALE, FL 33309.
terms.Section21ThankYou: Thank you for using Toydacity and helping promote sustainable, joyful toy sharing!

policies.Title: Toydacity Privacy Policy
policies.Section1Intro: Toydacity Inc. operates an online platform enabling users to buy, sell, trade, and gift pre-owned toys through our website (www.toydacity.com), mobile applications, and related services (collectively, the Toydacity Service). This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you interact with our Service.
policies.Section1Consent: By accessing or using Toydacity, you consent to the practices described herein. We may modify this policy periodically; material changes will be communicated via email, in-app notifications, or by updating the Last Updated date. Your continued use constitutes acceptance.
policies.Section1StateNote: For residents of California, Florida, Virginia, Colorado, Connecticut, and other jurisdictions with specific privacy laws, refer to Section 9 (State-Specific Disclosures).
policies.Section2Sub1Intro: We collect data you voluntarily submit when:
policies.Section2Sub1ListItem1Desc: Full name, email address, encrypted password, phone number, postal address (for local transactions), and profile photo.
policies.Section2Sub1ListItem2Desc: Photographs, descriptions (e.g., brand, age range, condition), pricing, and location tags.
policies.Section2Sub1ListItem3Desc: Messages with other users, customer support tickets, and public reviews/ratings.
policies.Section2Sub1ListItem4Desc: For enhanced trust programs (e.g., Toydacity Verified Seller), we may request government-issued IDs (e.g., driver's license) or utility bills, processed securely via third-party services like Jumio.
policies.Section2Sub1ListItem5Desc: While Toydacity does not directly handle payment details, we facilitate transactions through Stripe, Inc., which collects banking information, Social Security numbers (for sellers), and tax forms per their Privacy Policy.
policies.Section2Sub2ListItem1Desc: IP address, browser type, operating system, hardware model, unique device identifiers (e.g., IMEI), mobile network data, and timestamps.
policies.Section2Sub2ListItem2Desc: Pages visited, clickstream patterns, search queries, time spent on listings, and interaction metrics (e.g., favorites, shares).
policies.Section2Sub2ListItem3Desc: Precise GPS coordinates (if enabled via device permissions) or approximate location derived from IP addresses to facilitate local transactions.
policies.Section2Sub2ListItem4Sub1Desc: Session management and security (e.g., CSRF tokens).
policies.Section2Sub2ListItem4Sub2Desc: Google Analytics to monitor traffic patterns.
policies.Section2Sub2ListItem4Sub3Desc: Facebook Pixel and Google Ads for retargeting (opt-out instructions in Section 6.3).
policies.Section2Sub2ListItem4Sub4Desc: Embedded in emails to track open rates.
policies.Section2Sub3ListItem1Desc: If you register via Facebook/Google, we receive profile data (name, email, friend lists) as permitted by their platforms.
policies.Section2Sub3ListItem2Desc: For fraud prevention, we may cross-reference data with public databases (e.g., OFAC sanctions lists) via services like Socure.
policies.Section2Sub3ListItem3Desc: Stripe provides transaction confirmations, dispute records, and limited KYC data.
policies.Section3Sub1ListItem1: Facilitate toy transactions, including bid processing, messaging, and payment confirmations.
policies.Section3Sub1ListItem2: Personalize recommendations (e.g., Trending LEGO Sets Near You).
policies.Section3Sub1ListItem3: Verify identities to reduce fraud (e.g., flagging counterfeit toys).
policies.Section3Sub2ListItem1: Detect and prevent scams, money laundering, or illegal items (e.g., recalled toys).
policies.Section3Sub2ListItem2: Resolve disputes between users through transaction logs and chat histories.
policies.Section3Sub2ListItem3: Comply with legal requests (e.g., subpoenas, tax reporting).
policies.Section3Sub3ListItem1: Send promotional emails (opt-out anytime) about seasonal toy drives or discounts.
policies.Section3Sub3ListItem2: Conduct A/B testing to improve UI/UX.
policies.Section3Sub3ListItem3: Share aggregated trends with partners (e.g., Most Traded Toys of 2025).
policies.Section4Sub1ListItem1Desc: Username, city, and average response time.
policies.Section4Sub1ListItem2Desc: Photos, descriptions, and approximate location (e.g., 3 miles away).
policies.Section4Sub2ListItem3Desc: Meta and Google for targeted ads (anonymized where possible).
policies.Section4Sub3ListItem1Desc: When required to investigate harm or illegal activity (e.g., child safety violations).
policies.Section4Sub3ListItem2Desc: Data transfer to successors, with user notification.
policies.Section4Sub4Content: Shared for market research (e.g., 70% of users trade toys within 10 miles).
policies.Section5ListItem1Desc: AES-256 for data at rest, TLS 1.3 for transmissions.
policies.Section5ListItem3Desc: Annual penetration testing by third-party firms.
policies.Section5SecurityNote: No system is 100% secure‚Äîpromptly report suspicious activity to security@toydacity.com.
policies.Section6Sub1ListItem1: Edit profile or delete account via Settings > Account Management.
policies.Section6Sub1ListItem2: Note: Transaction histories may be retained for legal compliance.
policies.Section6Sub2ListItem1: Disable GPS tracking via device settings.
policies.Section6Sub2ListItem2: Reject non-essential cookies via our Cookie Banner.
policies.Section6Sub3ListItem2Desc: Limit ad tracking in iOS/Android settings.
policies.Section7Intro: Toydacity is committed to protecting the privacy of children and complying with all applicable laws, including the U.S. Children‚Äôs Online Privacy Protection Act (COPPA).
policies.Section7Sub1ListItem1Desc: The Toydacity Service is not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect, use, or disclose personal information from children under 13 without verifiable parental consent.
policies.Section7Sub1ListItem2Desc: Minors aged 13‚Äì17 may only use Toydacity under the supervision of a parent or legal guardian, who assumes responsibility for their compliance with our Terms of Service.
policies.Section7Sub2ListItem1Desc: Parents/guardians must review and approve their child‚Äôs account creation and monitor activity.
policies.Section7Sub2ListItem2Desc: If we discover that a child under 13 has provided personal information (e.g., via falsified age verification), we will:
policies.Section7Sub2ListItem2Bullet2: Notify the parent/guardian (if contact details are available).
policies.Section7Sub2ListItem2Bullet3: Delete all collected data unless retention is required by law (e.g., fraud investigations).
policies.Section7Sub2ListItem3Desc: For accounts suspected of belonging to underage users, we may request:
policies.Section7Sub2ListItem3Bullet1: Proof of parental consent (e.g., signed consent form).
policies.Section7Sub2ListItem3Bullet2: Government-issued ID to confirm guardian identity.
policies.Section8Content: Data is processed in the U.S. Non-U.S. users consent to this transfer.
policies.Section9Sub1IntroStrong: Under the California Consumer Privacy Act (as amended by the CPRA):
policies.Section9Sub1ListItem1Desc: Receive a detailed report (covering the past 12 months) of:
policies.Section9Sub1ListItem1Sub1: Categories of personal data collected (e.g., identifiers, commercial information, geolocation).
policies.Section9Sub1ListItem1Sub2: Specific pieces of data (e.g., message transcripts, transaction amounts).
policies.Section9Sub1ListItem1Sub3: Third parties with whom data was shared/sold.
policies.Section9Sub1ListItem2Desc: Request erasure of personal data, except where retention is required (e.g., fraud investigations, tax compliance).
policies.Section9Sub1ListItem3Desc: Update outdated or incorrect profile/transaction details.
policies.Section9Sub1ListItem4Desc: Disable ad-targeting via Settings > Privacy > Limit Data Sharing.
policies.Section9Sub1ListItem5Desc: Restrict processing of government IDs or precise location.
policies.Section9Sub1ListItem6Desc: No denial of services for exercising rights.
policies.Section9Sub1Method1: Email: privacy@toydacity.com (subject line: CA Privacy Request).
policies.Section9Sub1Method3Desc: Requires matching account email/phone and government-issued ID (for sensitive requests).
policies.Section9Sub2Title: 9.2 Florida Residents (Florida Digital Bill of Rights, Effective July 2024)
policies.Section9Sub2IntroStrong: As Toydacity‚Äôs headquarters is in Miami, FL, we adhere to the Florida Digital Bill of Rights (FDBR):
policies.Section9Sub2ListItem1Desc: Strictly prohibit data collection from users under 18 without verifiable parental consent (aligned with our general under-13 prohibition).
policies.Section9Sub2ListItem2Desc: Florida minors are automatically excluded from ad targeting. Adults may opt out via Settings > Ads > Disable Personalized Ads.
policies.Section9Sub2ListItem3Desc: Toydacity does not sell data to third-party brokers.
policies.Section9Sub2ListItem4Desc: Contest denied requests within 30 days via our Privacy Portal.
policies.Section9Sub3ListItem1Desc: Request disclosure of data categories (e.g., payment records, device identifiers).
policies.Section9Sub3ListItem2Desc: Receive machine-readable copies (JSON/CSV) of provided data.
policies.Section9Sub3ListItem3Desc: Rectify inaccuracies in listings or account details.
policies.Section9Sub3ListItem4Bullet2: Profiling for automated decisions (e.g., fraud risk scoring).
policies.Section9Sub3ListItem4Bullet3: Data sales (though Toydacity only shares data for service operations, not monetary gain).
policies.Section9Sub3Note: Response Timeline: 45 days (extendable to 90 with notice).
policies.Section9Sub4Title: 9.4 Texas Residents (Texas Data Privacy and Security Act, Effective July 2024)
policies.Section9Sub4ListItem1Desc: Honor browser-based signals (e.g., Global Privacy Control) for data sales/targeted ads.
policies.Section9Sub4ListItem2Desc: Toydacity does not collect facial recognition or fingerprint data.
policies.Section9Sub4ListItem3Desc: Submit appeals via privacy@toydacity.com (responded to within 60 days).
policies.Section9Sub5Title: 9.5 Utah Residents (Utah Consumer Privacy Act, Effective Dec 2024)
policies.Section9Sub5ListItem1Desc: Limited to sales and targeted ads (exempts small businesses; Toydacity complies voluntarily).
policies.Section9Sub5ListItem2Desc: Collect only what is reasonably necessary for toy transactions.
policies.Section9Sub6ListItem1Desc: Email optout@toydacity.com to exclude data from sales (defined narrowly under Nevada law).

deleteData.subtitle: We understand that you may want to delete your account or data. Here are the steps to follow:
deleteData.subject: Data Deletion Request.
deleteData.body: Specify if deleting all data or specific listings.
deleteData.transactions: Transaction records may be retained for tax purposes (Florida Statute 212.03).

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.subtitle: At Toydacity, our mission is to create a sustainable and supportive ecosystem where families can give a second life to children‚Äôs items‚Äîwhile also building meaningful connections with one another.
mission.content: We believe that every toy, book, piece of clothing, or gear deserves the chance to bring joy to more than one child. By enabling parents to buy, sell, trade, or donate gently used children‚Äôs products, we not only help reduce waste and unnecessary spending, but also promote a culture of sharing, empathy, and environmental responsibility.
mission.more: More than just a marketplace, Toydacity is a community of parents helping parents‚Äîa place to find resources, ask questions, organize local events, and support one another in the journey of raising children.
mission.commitment: Our commitment is to empower families with tools to consume consciously, give generously, and raise the next generation in a world that values sustainability, connection, and care.
